title: How to Go Through Walls in Sudden Attack

steps.headline: Go to red team.
steps.description: It's on the map shark tail.

steps.headline: Go to the pile of snow.
Go on the snow.
steps.description: Slash the wall in front of you.

steps.headline: Keep on slashing.
steps.description: Continue until you see a white background, and keep slashing until you see no wall.

steps.headline: Slash the white background.
steps.description: Continue until you see the door in the respawn place.

steps.headline: Shoot bad guys.
steps.description: In case a bad guy comes through the door just shoot him.

steps.headline: Slash the background again.
steps.description: Continue until you see the gray machine.

steps.headline: Go to your right.
steps.description: You can see blue teams base.

steps.headline: Snipe at blue teams base.
steps.description: This will only work if you own a sniper.

steps.headline: Make sure the coast is clear.
steps.description: No one should see you cheating except your teammate.

text: Get a knife. It doesn't matter which one. Go to red team. It's on the map shark tail. Go to the pile of snow.  Go on the snow. Slash the wall in front of you. Keep on slashing. Continue until you see a white background, and keep slashing until you see no wall. Slash the white background. Continue until you see the door in the respawn place. Shoot bad guys. In case a bad guy comes through the door just shoot him. Slash the background again. Continue until you see the gray machine. Go to your right. You can see blue teams base. Snipe at blue teams base. This will only work if you own a sniper. Make sure the coast is clear. No one should see you cheating except your teammate.
